title: Hour 2: Favre Under Fire
description:
In this episode, Stephen A., Dan Orlovsky, and Damien Woody discuss the primetime matchup between the Eagles and Cowboys and debate who needs to show out the most for their team to get the dub: Hurts or Parsons? Aaron Rodgers and the Packers are coming off of a loss to the Giants and are now facing another New York team, but does the crew think the Jets have it in them to pull of the upset? We react to new comments from Brett Favre denying any wrongdoing in the midst of his involvement in a welfare scandal. Joe Fortenbaugh joins the show with his picks for this week's slate of games that you can take to the bank. Seth Wickersham joins the show with more on the developing story about Commanders owner Dan Snyder digging up dirt on other NFL owners and Commissioner Roger Goodell. Plus, Stephen A. and Dan go head to head in a debate over who poses the biggest threat to the Bills and Chiefs in the AFC.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: New comments from Brett Favre denying any wrongdoing in the midst of his involvement in a welfare scandal
